main module

author

Patrick Scheich

name

Level.py

created

  1. Mai 2022

description

Contains the Game class representing the basic game as also the main function which is starting the application

class main.Game

Bases: object

This class represents the game itself It instantiates class:Level. It contains basic Game mechanics and data management for the game

screen

Pygame Screen (Window Screen)

clock

Pygame clock for Framerate

level

Current, playable level

resize_window(event)

Sets new window size on resize event.

Parameters

event (pygame.event) – Pygame resie event, has new windo size on x and y coordinate

run()

Mainloop with standard event-handling of window events. Configuration ogf Game settings.
